mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Game_TB(game_no,category,name,rel_day,developer,content,min_spec,recom_spec,poster,like_cnt,hate_cnt,price,tag,movie,list_poster) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(game_no)+1,1) FROM Game_TB), #{category}, #{name}, #{rel_day}, #{developer}, #{content}, #{min_spec}, #{recom_spec}, #{poster}, #{like_cnt}, #{hate_cnt}, #{price}, #{tag}, #{movie}, #{list_poster} )
mapper.select: SELECT game_no,name,list_poster,price,tag,like_cnt,num FROM (SELECT game_no,name,list_poster,price,tag,like_cnt,rownum as num FROM (SELECT game_no,name,list_poster,price,tag,like_cnt FROM game_tb WHERE ROWID IN(SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM game_tb WHERE category=#{category} GROUP BY name)ORDER BY ${sort})) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10.0) FROM game_tb WHERE ROWID IN(SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM game_tb WHERE category=#{category} GROUP BY name)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM game_tb WHERE ROWID IN(SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM game_tb WHERE category=#{category} GROUP BY name)

SELECT game_no,name,list_poster,price,tag,like_cnt,num FROM (SELECT game_no,name,list_poster,price,tag,like_cnt,rownum as num FROM (SELECT game_no,name,list_poster,price,tag,like_cnt FROM game_tb WHERE ROWID IN(SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM game_tb WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{key}||'%') GROUP BY name)ORDER BY ${sort})) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10.0) FROM ((SELECT * FROM game_tb WHERE ROWID IN(SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM game_tb WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{key}||'%') GROUP BY name)ORDER BY game_no))
